arlin.utils.saving_loading.save_data(data, file_path)

Save data as a pickle file to given save path.

Parameters:

  • data (-) – Data to save

  • file_path (-) – File path to save the data to

Return type:

None

arlin.utils.saving_loading.load_data(file_path, allow_pickle=False)

Load and return data from given file path:

Parameters:

  • file_path (-) – Path to load file from

  • allow_pickle (-) – Whether or not to allow pickling in loading

Returns:

Loaded data

Return type:

  • Any
